item.title: Closing the Legal Gap on Gender Apartheid in Afghanistan
item.description: In early December, the international Permanent Peoples’ Tribunal in The Hague presented its verdict on the situation of women and girls in Afghanistan. Two days later, on Dec. 13, the French Senate convened a high-level hearing titled “No Peace Without Women: Their Representation in Diplomatic, Military and Political Bodies.” Together, these two forums — one ... Read more
